ygData.subject: Re: Talking In The Room
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She hugged Drillbit and rested her head on his shoulder. I love you.  She wondered how to be able to protect him at the same time, not show her

::KitKat::

She hugged Drillbit and rested her head on his shoulder. "I love 
you."  She wondered how to be able to protect him at the same time, 
not show her favoritism.  She sighed and held him close. She closed 
her eyes an felt safe in his arms. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He sat, and heard what she had to say. 
> "Well I think the council is a good idea. So the Ark is destroyed? I
> guess with the Autobots and Decepticons gone, the Ark wasn't as
> important as we thought." He didn't say anything to her about what 
she
> had said about him. He knew it was hard for her to command and 
love. He
> wraped his right arm around her, and his left arm on her cheek.
> "Know relax. You have been working to hard." He kissed her.
> "I love you, my wife to be."
